select a.idx ,a.id ,a.code ,a.zone ,a.weight ,a.price ,a.start_date ,a.end_date ,a.use_yn ,b.code_kname ,b.code_ename ,FN_LOCALE_MESSAGE(b.code_group, b.code_id, #{locale}) as codeName from tb_shipping_fees a join tb_use_code b on a.zone=b.code_etc and a.code=b.code_discript where a.use_yn = 'Y' and b.use_yn = 'Y' and a.id = #{id} and a.code = #{code} and start_date <= CURDATE() and end_date >= CURDATE()

SELECT API.confirmation_url as apiConfirmationUrl ,API.status as apiStatus ,PI.pay_id as payId ,B.master_code as masterCode FROM tb_shop as A join tb_delivery as B on A.shop_idx = B.shop_idx join tb_delivery_order O on B.master_code = O.master_code join tb_order_list OL on O.order_code = OL.order_code and A.shop_idx=OL.shop_idx join tb_pay_info PI on B.master_code = PI.master_code join tb_shopify_api_applicationchg API on PI.pay_id = API.pay_id WHERE O.hide_yn = 'N' AND OL.hide_yn = 'Y' AND OL.order_idx in (select order_idx from tb_order_detail where order_idx = OL.order_idx and del_yn = 'N') AND A.email = #{email} AND API.id = #{apiId} AND PI.total_amount > 0
